name: Kai Tak Aviation Education Limited
about: At Kai Tak Aviation Education Limited, we are dedicated to nurturing the spirit of aviation through innovative and interactive education. As a pioneering social enterprise, we offer a range of flying courses, including tailored programs for government departments, schools, and NGOs. Our curriculum includes FAA PPL Ground Theory, Canadian PPL, and Jet Aircraft Flight Simulator sessions. We also specialize in Unmanned Aircraft System (UAS) training, conducted by experienced drone pilots. Our vision is to open up the aviation industry to young individuals in Hong Kong through scholarships and comprehensive training, ensuring the next generation of aviation professionals is well-equipped and enthusiastic. With a strong commitment to social enterprise and community development, we strive to make aviation accessible and engaging for all. Join us in shaping the future of aviation.
